_xResult.title: Floral Blazer or Suit Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Chintz fabric jacket to pair with jeans or matching skirt
_xResult.longdesc:
Balodana is the exclusive marketplace for Zaza in the USA, so you'll be one of the first to own this fabulous blazer made of fine chintz floral fabric. A classic  for any season, it surpasses trends and will quickly become your favorite closet go-to for a casual engagement or an executive meeting. 

 

Elegant European cut (tight to the body, unless you specify otherwise), the structured blazer features details such as double welted pockets, one- or two-button front, and contrast lining.  The navy chintz is printed with large flowers gives this jacket a chic look for the perfect office and leisure time. It can be worn with one of Zaza's matching skirts (pleated or as shown in pencil style) to make a stunning suit, or with basic blue jeans and Tshirt or blouse. 

  • Slim Fit Cut (unless specified otherwise)
  • Closes in front with one button (unless specified otherwise)
  • Fully lined

When ordering, please specify the length you want on the arm (measure from top of shoulder to desired length, either at or below wristbone. Also, specify if you'd like to have additional fabric built into the jacket - this is a premium feature so that you can easily alter the jacket if you have a weight change. You'll treasure this jacket for many years and with this option you can feel confident it will always fit you well.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and dry clean only.
